Summary Note:
The RM was introduced to Sanders Dumont Sterckx at a corporate retreat in Brussels. They participated in team-building activities and developed a strong rapport, which eventually led to a successful business partnership.
Sanders Dumont Sterckx is a 56 year old CEO from Belgium.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced he to join.
Family Background: Sanders Dumont Sterckx is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
In 1988, Sanders finished his secondary school education at Institut des Ursulines.
After that, he went on to study at Ghent University until 1991.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 33 years, Sanders Dumont Sterckx has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Sanders Dumont Sterckx launched his career as a Research Scientist at UCB Pharma SA, where he gained valuable experience from 1992 to 1997.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Clinical Trials Manager at GSK Vaccines SA in 1999, further expanding his skill set.
He spent 5 years working as a Regulatory Affairs Director at Pfizer Belgium SA, refining his expertise and building a strong network.
After 15 years of dedication, he assumed the role of CEO at UCB Pharma SA in 2008, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 1030000 EUR.
He owns condo in Lokeren, where he resides. It is worth 1020000 EUR.

He inherited 440000 EUR from his grandmother, a well-known Real Estate Developer, in 2005, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
